feed.title: WeKan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.57
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Rework fix for mobile devices to incorporate all themes/list headers. Thanks to walster001.
  • Update templates to use label instead of span. Thanks to novashdima.
  • Large updates to UI CSS. Thanks to walster001.
  • Updated dependencies. Thanks to developers of dependencies.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.58
entry.content:
This release tries to fix the following bugs:

  • Try to fix apparrmor denied in syslog at Snap Candidate. Thanks to webenefits and xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.59
entry.content:
This release tries to fix the following bugs:

  • Try 2 to fix apparmor denied in syslog at Snap Candidate. Newest MongoDB uses --host, not anymore --bind_ip. Thanks to webenefits and xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.60
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Added to Docs CNAME DNS info about CloudFlare and Sandstorm. Thanks to xet7.
  • Switch from kadira:flow-router to ostrio:flow-router-extra. Thanks to imajus.
  • Removed outdated dependency page. To be seen, does anything break. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.61
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Testing packages without versions from, for upcoming upgrades. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated to MongoDB 6.0.18 at Snap Candidate. Thanks to MongoDB developers.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Try 3 to fix apparmor denied in syslog at Snap Candidate. Changed MongoDB --host back to --bind_ip. Thanks to webenefits and xet7.
  • Try 4 to fix apparmor denied in syslog at Snap Candidate. Thanks to webenefits and xet7.
  • Try 5 to fix apparmor denied in syslog at Snap Candidate. Thanks to webenefits and xet7.
  • Try 6 to fix apparmor denied in syslog at Snap Candidate. Thanks to webenefits and xet7.
  • Renaming list shows in activities. Thanks to AdenKoziol.
  • Fixing opening cards and slow performance of closing cards by reverting switching kadira:flow-router to ostrio:flow-router-extra. Thanks to mfilser.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.
